name: Ext_R5_Questionnaire_it_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Questionnaire.item.type for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Questionnaire.item.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Questionnaire|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: group | display | boolean | decimal | integer | date | dateTime +
element.definition: The type of questionnaire item this is - whether text for display, a grouping of other items or a particular type of data to be captured (string, integer, Coding, etc.).
element.comment: `Questionnaire.item.type` maps to R4B `Questionnaire.item.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: group | display | boolean | decimal | integer | date | dateTime +
element.definition: The type of questionnaire item this is - whether text for display, a grouping of other items or a particular type of data to be captured (string, integer, Coding, etc.).
element.comment: `Questionnaire.item.type` maps to R4B `Questionnaire.item.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Distinguishes groups from questions and display text and indicates data type for questions.
